name: df-dig
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cdig, cmpt(s0, cn, cmpo(s1, s2, cz, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(cfv(cfl, co(co(cv(s0), cexp, cneg(cv(s1))), cmul, cv(s2))), cmo, cv(s0)))))
comment: Definition of an operation to obtain the ` k ` th digit of a nonnegative real number ` r ` in the positional system with base ` b ` . ` k = - 1 ` corresponds to the first digit of the fractional part (for ` b = ` 10 the first digit after the decimal point), ` k = ` 0 corresponds to the last digit of the integer part (for ` b = ` 10 the first digit before the decimal point). See also ~ digit1 . Examples (not formal): ( 234.567 ( digit `` 10 ) 0 ) = 4; ( 2.567 ( digit `` 10 ) -2 ) = 6; ( 2345.67 ( digit `` 10 ) 2 ) = 3. (Contributed by AV, 16-May-2020.)
